summary: "TAKATA RECALL" :   NOW 13+ MONTHS SINCE 1ST HEARD OF THIS RECALL!  ALSO JUST HEARD THAT ANOTHER DRIVER HAS DIED BECAUSE OF THIS PROBLEM  ( 18 AND COUNTING WORLDWIDE ), AND THAT TAKATA HAS FILED FOR BANKRUPTCY!  SUPPOSEDLY THE LATEST DRIVER TO DIE RECEIVED 10 NOTICES AND FAILED TO HAVE THE PROBLEM RESOLVED. WHAT I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IS WHY I HAVE YET TOO RECEIVE EVEN MY 1ST NOTICE???  IS IT BECAUSE I AM A "SECONDARY" OWNER AND DO NOT HAVE THE SAME "RIGHTS" AS AN ORIGINAL OWNER?  PROTECTION SHOULD BE EQUAL UNDER THE LAW!!!
